about.name: Carol Stefania Puentes Motta
about.title: Software Engineer
about.description: Hi! I'm a junior software engineer with a background in full-stack development. I stand out for being proactive, analytical, and highly adaptable. I focus on creating functional and intuitive solutions that improve the user experience. I enjoy working in teams, taking on new challenges, and continually learning to add value to both the frontend and backend.

project1.title: Landing Page
project1.description: This independent project is a landing page for a fast food store.

project2.title: Color palette
project2.description: This project consists of a color palette generator.

project3.title: Wonders of the World
project3.description: This is a simple game in which you drag the features of a Wonder of the World onto its image.

project4.title: Tic-tac-toe
project4.description: This project is based on the traditional tic-tac-toe mobile game, but with a Spider-Man theme.

project5.title: Login-Register
project5.description: This project is based on a Firebase-validated login and registration framework powered by React-Native.

project6.title: Interactive Registration Form
project6.description: This is a Registration Form with HTML and CSS to collect user data in an accessible way.

project7.title: Agricultural Monitoring System Prototyping
project7.description: This prototype is a mobile app developed with React Native for monitoring salad tomato crops.

project8.title: React Native library app prototype
project8.description: This prototype is a student project developed with React Native for library management.
